name: pin_removed
desc: A pin was removed from a channel.
long_desc: My Slack API Start here App features Messages APIs Slack App Directory Authentication Keep in touch Community A pin was removed from a channel  				Compatibility:									RTM 													Events API 							  					Scopes:					pins:read 				 When an item is un-pinned from a channel, the pin_removed event is sent to all members of that channel. The has_pins property indicates that there are other pinned items in that channel.
